title: Foreign Minister Steinmeier condemns bombing in Ankara (Foreign Office of the Federal Republic of Germany)
text: ( Source : Foreign Office of the Federal Republic of Germany ) This brutal terrorist attack on peaceful demonstrators is also an attack on the democratic process in Turkey , which I condemn in the strongest possible terms. The perpetrators are
